Vilayanur S. Ramachandran.title: Professor of Neuroscience and Psychology, Director of the Brain Perception Laboratory, University of California, San Diego and Professor at the Salk Institute

John N. Gray.title: Professor of European Thought, London School of Economics

Simon Schama.title: Old Dominion Professor of Humanities, Columbia University in New York and currently filming a 16-part series for BBC Television on the history of Britain

Lady Antonia Fraser.title: historian, writer and author of biographies of Mary Queen of Scots, Cromwell and Charles II

Richard Sennett.title: visiting professor, London School of Economics and author of The Corrosion of Character – the Personal Consequences of Work in the New Capitalism

Melanie Phillips.title: columnist on The Sunday Times and currently working on a book about The Sex Change State

Dan Robinson.title: Distinguished Research Professor, Georgetown University and visiting lecturer in Philosophy and Senior Member of Linacre College, Oxford

Doreen Massey.title: Professor of Geography, Faculty of Social Sciences, Open University and recipient of the Vautrin Lud International Geography Prize and the Victoria Medal of the Royal Geographical Society

Mary Midgley.title: moral philosopher and former Senior Lecturer in Philosophy, University of Newcastle

Ian McEwan.title: novelist and author of the Booker Prize-winning novel Amsterdam

Gore Vidal.title: American writer, commentator and author of The Smithsonian Institution

Alan Clark.title: historian, politician and author of The Tories: Conservatives and the Nation State, 1922–97

Michael Ignatieff.title: writer, broadcaster and biographer of Isaiah Berlin
